items.headline: Netflix just boosted its case to win Warner Bros. Here’s why.

items.headline: United’s stock rallies as airline’s perks and loyalty strategy pays off
items.summary_en: United Airlines late Tuesday reported better-than-expected profits for the holiday quarter, saying its focus on loyal fliers is paying off and that “strong momentum” continued into the new year.

items.headline: ‘Sell America’ trade makes a comeback as U.S. stocks see biggest drop in months. Here’s what investors need to know.
items.summary_en: The “Sell America” trade made a comeback on Tuesday following President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats against European allies, giving investors a taste of the volatility that rocked global markets in April.

items.headline: Here’s how much risk the U.S. faces if global investors ‘weaponize’ American stocks and bonds
